observation: On November 20th, @FrankGrimes was observed to perform to a poor standard. This was evidenced by his frustration and poor attitude while working on a maintenance task with @HomerSimpson. Frank struggled to work collaboratively with Homer, who he saw as lazy and incompetent. His constant complaints and negativity led to tension between the two and slowed down their progress on the task. #Collaboration #Attitude #Tension
